activities: In the course of providing relocation and assignment management services, TheMIGroup acts as a data processor and processes data in accordance with instructions of its clients (Data Controllers) and customers.  In its role as a data processor, TheMIGroup collects personally identifiable data about transferees and assignees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Insurance Services - (INS)Transportation Srvs (Except Aviation) - (TRN)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)
recoursemech: TheMIGroup offers the independent dispute resolution services of the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program) for all complaints involving the collection of non-human resources data.  Furthermore, TheMIGroup agrees to fully cooperate with the E.U. and Swiss data protection authorities.
